languages.text: "Не надо". {n}Джай останавливает вас быстрым жестом, и на губах Пощады расцветает довольная улыбка. Но она высыхает, стоит Джай добавить:{/n} "Я сама".
"Don't." {n}Jae quickly stops you with a gesture, which brings a self-satisfied smile to Mercy's lips. But the smile drops away at Jae's next words:{/n} "I'll do it myself."
languages.original_text: "Не надо". {n}Джай останавливает вас быстрым жестом, и на губах Пощады расцветает довольная улыбка. Но она высыхает, стоит Джай добавить:{/n} "Я сама".

traits.locale_text: "Don't." {n}Jae quickly stops you with a gesture, which brings a self-satisfied smile to Mercy's lips. But the smile drops away at Jae's next words:{/n} "I'll do it myself."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Don't." {n}Jae quickly stops you with a gesture, which brings a self-satisfied smile to Mercy's lips. But the smile drops away at Jae's next words:{/n} "I'll do it myself."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “住手。”{n}婕伊很快做了个手势，拦住了你。悯慈见状，嘴角露出了一丝自得的微笑，但婕伊接下来的话，让他的笑容消失了。{/n}“我亲自动手。”
languages.original_text: "Don't." {n}Jae quickly stops you with a gesture, which brings a self-satisfied smile to Mercy's lips. But the smile drops away at Jae's next words:{/n} "I'll do it myself."

traits.locale_text: “住手。”{n}婕伊很快做了个手势，拦住了你。悯慈见状，嘴角露出了一丝自得的微笑，但婕伊接下来的话，让他的笑容消失了。{/n}“我亲自动手。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「やめて」{n}ジェイは、すぐに身振りで制止する。マーシーの唇に自己満足的な笑みが浮かぶ。しかし、ジェイの次の言葉に笑顔は消えた。{/n}「アタシが自分でやる」
languages.original_text: "Don't." {n}Jae quickly stops you with a gesture, which brings a self-satisfied smile to Mercy's lips. But the smile drops away at Jae's next words:{/n} "I'll do it myself."

traits.locale_text: 「やめて」{n}ジェイは、すぐに身振りで制止する。マーシーの唇に自己満足的な笑みが浮かぶ。しかし、ジェイの次の言葉に笑顔は消えた。{/n}「アタシが自分でやる」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «No». {n}Jae te detiene rápidamente con un gesto, lo que provoca una sonrisa de autosatisfacción en los labios de Mercy. Esta, sin embargo, se desvanece ante las siguientes palabras de Jae:{/n} «De esto me encargo yo».
languages.original_text: "Don't." {n}Jae quickly stops you with a gesture, which brings a self-satisfied smile to Mercy's lips. But the smile drops away at Jae's next words:{/n} "I'll do it myself."

traits.locale_text: «No». {n}Jae te detiene rápidamente con un gesto, lo que provoca una sonrisa de autosatisfacción en los labios de Mercy. Esta, sin embargo, se desvanece ante las siguientes palabras de Jae:{/n} «De esto me encargo yo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Non, » {n}dit Jae en vous interrompant d'un geste rapide. Sa réaction fait apparaître un sourire de contentement sur les lèvres de Mercy, mais celui-ci disparaît bien vite lorsqu'il entend la suite :{/n} « Laissez-moi faire. »
languages.original_text: "Don't." {n}Jae quickly stops you with a gesture, which brings a self-satisfied smile to Mercy's lips. But the smile drops away at Jae's next words:{/n} "I'll do it myself."

traits.locale_text: « Non, » {n}dit Jae en vous interrompant d'un geste rapide. Sa réaction fait apparaître un sourire de contentement sur les lèvres de Mercy, mais celui-ci disparaît bien vite lorsqu'il entend la suite :{/n} « Laissez-moi faire. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Tut das nicht." {n}Mit einer Geste sorgt Jae schnell dafür, dass du innehältst, was Mercy selbstgefällig lächeln lässt. Aber sein Lächeln verschwindet, nachdem Jae ihre nächsten Worte ausspricht:{/n} "Ich mache es selbst."
languages.original_text: "Don't." {n}Jae quickly stops you with a gesture, which brings a self-satisfied smile to Mercy's lips. But the smile drops away at Jae's next words:{/n} "I'll do it myself."

traits.locale_text: "Tut das nicht. {n}Mit einer Geste sorgt Jae schnell dafür, dass du innehältst, was Mercy selbstgefällig lächeln lässt. Aber sein Lächeln verschwindet, nachdem Jae ihre nächsten Worte ausspricht:{/n} "Ich mache es selbst."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Yapma." {n}Jae, el hareketiyle seni hemen durduruyor. Bu hareketi, Merhamet'in yüzünde kendinden memnun bir gülümseme peyda olmasına sebep oluyor. Bu gülümseme, Jae'ın sonraki sözcükleriyle anında siliniyor.{/n} "Kendim yaparım."
languages.original_text: "Don't." {n}Jae quickly stops you with a gesture, which brings a self-satisfied smile to Mercy's lips. But the smile drops away at Jae's next words:{/n} "I'll do it myself."

traits.locale_text: "Yapma." {n}Jae bir el hareketiyle seni hemen durduruyor ve bu hareketi Merhamet'in yüzünde kendinden memnun bir gülümseme peyda olmasına sebep oluyor. Ama bu gülümseme Jae'ın sonraki sözcükleriyle anında siliniyor.{/n} "Kendim yaparım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
